name: Studio Trasylvania
goal: To present and represent the region of Transylvania (Romania) in Belgium and in the European Union. To bring closer the identity of Transylvania to the decision makers and stakeholders.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Communication, Culture, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Enlargement, Enterprise, Information Society, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy, Youth
euInitiatives:
- Specific provisions for the support from the European Regional Development Fund to the European territorial cooperation goal
- The right funding mix for Europe’s regions: balancing financial instruments and grants in EU cohesion policy
- Promotion of Internet connectivity in local communities
- Promotion of the use of energy from renewable sources
- Territorial typologies
- Implementation of EU macro­regional strategies
- European Year of Cultural Heritage
- Establishing a Union action for the European Capitals of Culture for the years 2020 to 2033
- Audio-visual media services
